data.lyric:
[ti:Surf]
[ar:Mac Miller]
[al:Circles (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Surf - Mac Miller
[00:01.78]Lyrics by：J. Brion/M. McCormick
[00:03.57]Yeah yeah
[00:06.56]Hey hey hey
[00:09.79]Hey hey hey
[00:13.02]Hey hey hey
[00:16.29]Hey hey
[00:18.25]Said
[00:19.50]Where are you goin' can I come too
[00:25.70]The whole world is open a playground for me and you
[00:31.36]And we could be fine s**t who the hell knows
[00:37.67]It's your eyes and your ears and your mouth and your nose
[00:41.58]Head and your shoulders your knees and your toes
[00:45.42]I dream of this moment
[00:48.93]Will it come true
[00:51.97]The whole world they know it
[00:54.16]They just waitin' for me and you
[00:57.34]And she just like I
[01:01.40]Got her head in the clouds
[01:03.96]Don't need to be lower
[01:05.76]Before it's all over I promise we'll figure it out
[01:09.82]I ain't comin' down
[01:13.42]Why would I need to
[01:16.41]So much of this world is above us baby
[01:20.15]They might tell you that I went crazy
[01:22.88]I'm just tryna read you
[01:27.26]Ooh ooh oohh
[01:33.33]Ooh ooh oohh
[01:37.00]I know we try
[01:39.70]And the days they go by
[01:43.41]Until we get old
[01:46.67]There's water in the flowers let's grow
[01:50.02]People they lie
[01:53.21]But hey so do I
[01:56.29]Until it gets old
[01:59.69]There's water in the flowers let's grow
[02:03.39]Let it go let it be
[02:09.94]We're all we need today
[02:16.70]Let it go let it be
[02:23.22]Mmm mmm mmm mmm
[02:28.07]Yeah well
[02:29.68]Sometimes I get lonely
[02:33.05]Not when I'm alone
[02:36.09]But it's more when I'm standin' in crowds
[02:38.55]That I'm feelin' the most on my own
[02:41.56]And I know that somebody knows me
[02:45.91]I know somewhere there's home
[02:49.40]I'm startin' to see that all I have to do is get up and go
[02:55.18]Goin' goin' goin' before I'm gone
[03:01.16]Gotta get goin' goin' goin' before I'm gone
[03:06.89]Ayy and I know we try
[03:11.66]Days they go by
[03:14.53]Until we get old
[03:17.84]There's water in the flowers let's grow
[03:21.31]People they lie
[03:24.46]But hey so do I
[03:27.75]Until it gets old
[03:30.90]There's water in the flowers let's grow
data.trans:
[ti:Surf]
[ar:Mac Miller]
[al:Circles (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:01.78]//
[00:03.57]//
[00:06.56]//
[00:09.79]//
[00:13.02]//
[00:16.29]//
[00:18.25]我说
[00:19.50]你要去哪里 我能跟你走吗
[00:25.70]整个世界都是我和你的游乐园
[00:31.36]我们会很快乐 谁知道呢
[00:37.67]你的眼眸 你的耳朵 你的嘴唇 你的鼻子
[00:41.58]你的脸庞 你的肩膀 你的膝盖 你的脚趾
[00:45.42]是我此刻最想见到的
[00:48.93]这个愿望能否成真
[00:51.97]全世界都知道
[00:54.16]他们都在等待我和你
[00:57.34]而她 就好像
[01:01.40]我让她心神不宁
[01:03.96]不必放低姿态
[01:05.76]在一切结束之前 我保证我们会弄明白
[01:09.82]我不会平静下来
[01:13.42]我有什么必要这样做
[01:16.41]这世界有很多东西我们无法理解 宝贝
[01:20.15]他们可能会跟你说我是个疯子
[01:22.88]我只想读懂你的心
[01:27.26]//
[01:33.33]//
[01:37.00]我知道我们很努力
[01:39.70]时间一刻不停地流逝
[01:43.41]直到我们老去为止
[01:46.67]鲜花已经浇了水 我们一起成长吧
[01:50.02]人们总是说谎话
[01:53.21]但我也一样
[01:56.29]直到时间尽头
[01:59.69]鲜花已经浇了水 我们一起成长吧
[02:03.39]顺其自然吧
[02:09.94]今天我们只要有彼此就够了
[02:16.70]顺其自然吧
[02:23.22]//
[02:28.07]的确
[02:29.68]有时候我会寂寞
[02:33.05]并不是指我一个人的时候
[02:36.09]更多的是我站在人群之中的时候
[02:38.55]我反而感觉尤其孤单
[02:41.56]我知道有人了解我
[02:45.91]我知道家就在某个地方
[02:49.40]我渐渐明白 我要做的是行动起来
[02:55.18]趁我生命尚在 好好奋斗
[03:01.16]必须趁我生命尚在 好好奋斗
[03:06.89]我知道我们很努力
[03:11.66]时光依然在流淌
[03:14.53]直到我们老去为止
[03:17.84]鲜花已经浇了水 我们一起成长吧
[03:21.31]人们总是说谎话
[03:24.46]但我也一样
[03:27.75]直到时间尽头
[03:30.90]鲜花已经浇了水 我们一起成长吧
